law.catch_line: A parent may not willfully fail to provide for the support of his or her minor child....

text.section: A parent may not willfully fail to provide for the support of his or her minor child.
A parent may not desert his or her minor child.
An individual who violates this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to a fine not exceeding $100 or imprisonment not exceeding 3 years or both.
